一批「貌丑，似鱼」的难民蹈海而过，消失在洪水中。
column9: When the great flood occurred, there were eyewitness reports from the New World.\nA group of "ugly, fish-like" refugees crossed the sea and disappeared into the flood.

column8: 据传，他们自称为古代文明的传承者，身上流着「神明」赐予的血。
column9: Legend has it that they claim to be the inheritors of an ancient civilization, with blood bestowed by "God" flowing through their veins.

column8: 这些人出生时都是人类模样，是神血导致他们逐步异变成你们所看到的样子。
column9: These people were born as humans, but the divine blood gradually transformed them into what you see now.

column8: 所以那个少年最后也会变成鱼人的模样……
column9: So that boy will eventually take on the appearance of a fishman...

column8: 你在说凯刻斯吗？如果想知道他的事，我可以告诉你。
column9: Are you talking about Caecus? If you want to know about him, I can tell you.

column8: 拉蒙娜点点头，示意船长继续说下去。
column9: Ramona nodded, signaling the captain to continue.

column8:
说起凯刻斯……那孩子也是魔像，用你们的话来说，是唤醒体。
大概是链接着弥利亚姆的吧。
column9: Speaking of Caecus... that kid is a Golem, or in your terms, an Awakener.\nHe's probably linked to Miryam.

column8: 链接着弥利亚姆？！居然能以唤醒体之身再链接唤醒体，我闻所未闻……
column9: Linked to Miryam?! Linking from one Awakener to another is unheard of…

column8: 哈，那女人可是当之无愧的怪物。
column9: Ha, that woman is truly a monster.

column8: 为了牵制我，教团会定期给我稳定心神的药物。上一任接头者完全失去理智后，凯刻斯就成了新的送药人。
column9: To keep me in check, the cult regularly administered drugs to stabilize my mind. After the previous contact completely lost their sanity, Caecus became the new deliverer.

column8: 这些年里我们每个季度都会见面……教他喝酒钓鱼，带他在夏天里辨认启明星，帮他拔掉冬天里干硬的鳞片……
column9: We've met every quarter in these years... taught him how to drink and fish, showed him the morning star in summer, and helped him remove dry scales in winter...

column8: 哈哈……我还以为我们已经是朋友了。所以他传信说，可以最后一次给我药物时，我没有犹豫过。
column9: Haha... I thought we were already friends. So when he sent word that he could give me the medicine one last time, I didn't hesitate.

column8: 但……也正是他将索纳尼尔号的行踪告诉了教团。
column9: But... it was he who revealed the whereabouts of the Sona-Nyl to the cult.

column8: 没有人教过他什么是正确的，他也没有找到自己在蹈海者之外的存在意义。
column9: No one taught him what was right, nor had he found a meaning for his existence beyond being a Seafarer.

column8: 如果在他看来，交出我能换取他在教团中的地位……我不会因此怨恨他。
column9: If, in his view, handing me over can secure his position in the Order... I won't hold it against him.

column8: 金属碰撞的声音突兀响起，拉蒙娜迅速摆出迎战姿态，护在船长和墨菲身前。
column9: The sudden clash of metal rang out. Ramona quickly took a defensive stance, shielding the captain and Murphy.

column8: 什么人！
column9: Who's there!

column8: 偷听者举着骨质长矛匆匆离开，拉蒙娜追上去，只看见一个黑袍身影消失在走廊尽头。
column9: The eavesdropper hurried away with a bone spear. Ramona chased after, only to see a black-robed figure vanish at the end of the corridor.

column8: ……凯刻斯。
column9: ......Caecus.

column8: 那个唤醒体少年没有失控，而戈利亚也是。
column9: The Awakener boy didn't lose control, and neither did Goliath.

column8: 船长，你刚刚说过，凯刻斯的链接者是弥利亚姆……对这件事，你有十分的肯定吗？
column9: Captain, you just mentioned that Miryam is Caecus's Link... Are you absolutely certain about this?

column8: 据我所知，不会错。
column9: As far as I know, there's no mistake

column8: 朵尔，你听见了吗？
column9: Doll, did you hear that?

column8: 这意味着，蹈海者主祭弥利亚姆尚未失能。
column9: This means that Miryam, the High Priestess of the Seafarers, has not been incapacitated.

column8: 至于守密人的昏迷……在弥萨格的一年中，%heorshe%从未出现过这样的突发昏迷。

column9: Meanwhile\nPower Room of the Sona-Nyl

column8: 脆弱的甲板木条和钢架结构无法阻挡灵知的波动，冲击波般的能量席卷了爆炸后的动力室。
column9: The fragile wood of the deck planks and steel framework could not withstand the surging Gnosis wave; waves of explosive energy swept through the power room after the blast.

column8: 从一片的黑褐色的残骸与废墟中，她僵硬地动了起来，仿佛被鲜血香气引诱的狼，也像一具没有思考能力的傀儡。
column9: Amidst the dark brown wreckage and ruins, she moved stiffly; like a wolf lured by the scent of blood, or like a mindless puppet wthout a master.

column8: 躯体的一举一动都受到了某种不可知力量的牵引，她面无表情地，甚至有些异样地，缓慢推开残骸，爬出了废墟。
column9: Every movement of her body seemed to be guided by some unknown force. With a blank and somewhat strange expression, she slowly pushed away the debris and crawled out of the ruins.

column8: 没有人知道是怎样灰暗的执念与力量掌控着她，她妍丽的脸上满是尘污，眼睛空洞灰暗，没有一丝光彩，却闪烁着诡异的光芒。
column9: No one knew what dark obsession and power controlled her. Her once-beautiful face was covered in dirt and grime, her eyes hollow and dull, devoid of light—yet they shone with an eerie glow.

column8: 如同从绝望深渊中升起的恐惧与危险。
column9: As if fear and danger itself had risen from the abyss of despair.
